power.title: Avernian Eruption
power.fluff: Acrid orange flames hiss up from beneath the ground, then suddenly ignite in a thundering detonation, burning any creature in the area with searing flames

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d12 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Each target takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes against this ongoing damage.

power.title: Blistering Torrent
power.fluff: As you utter blistering words, your foes feel a dull pain that crescendos into a sharp pain and leaves them unable to hear for a time

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is deafened until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, all creatures have concealment against the target if they are more than 2 squares away from it.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: The target is also slowed (save ends).

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: The target is also weakened until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is deafened until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Crackling Fire
power.fluff: An eldritch storm of fire and lightning erupts from you to scour your foes, leaving them vulnerable to future attacks

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: You can choose to replace one of the damage types this power deals with your current elemental affinity. If you do, the power changes both its keyword and the vulnerable it bestows to match your affinity.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier fire and lightning damage, and the target is scoured by eldritch energies (save ends).
While scoured, the target has vulnerable 5 fire and vulnerable 5 lightning.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Crown of Madness
power.fluff: You cause an illusory, twisted crown to appear around the target's head and to psychically assault the enemy, causing it to lose the ability to distinguish friend from foe

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target must use a free interrupt to make a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is subjected to madness (save ends).
While the target is subjected to madness, you can use the following action once per round, starting on your next turn.

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice as a free reaction. If it misses this attack, it takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Curse of the Bloody Fangs
power.fluff: You call up a pack of ferocious, phantasmal beasts from the darkest and most savage depths of the Feywild, though only their slavering fangs appear in this world, snapping and rending in a mad frenzy at the foe you ahve cursed

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is cursed by bloody fangs (save ends).
While it is cursed, the target and each enemy adjacent to it take damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhanchement bonus at the start of the target's turn.

power.title: Deathly Conduit
power.fluff: Noxious black clouds roil around your foes both close and far, your power drawing you from one cloud to the other in the blink of an eye

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You have concealment against attacks triggered by using this power.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each creature adjacent to you takes necrotic damage equal to 3 + your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
You teleport to an unoccupied square in the burst.

power.title: Emerald Shield
power.fluff: Your magic brings forth a shield that is a mixture of green quartz and scintillating energy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 shield bonus to AC and Reflex, and you can use the Emerald Radiance attack at-will.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An adjacent enemy attacks you

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes radiant damage equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Flames of the Smoking Crown
power.fluff: Hungry flames consume your enemy and send the creature into a panic that ignites your other foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The damage from the effect increases by +1d10, and the target is affected by the flames of the smoking crown (save ends).
While affected, the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage.

Each time before the target takes the ongoing damage, you slide it a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier. Each enemy adjacent to the target after the slide takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
If the target is bloodied, you increase the slide by 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

power.title: Forceful Assault
power.fluff: You wound your unware foe with the sheer force of your nature, and on the heels of that assault you deliver a bebilitating bolt of energy

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex
If you have combat advantage against the target, you can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier force damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
If you have combat advantage against the target, it takes a penalty to its first saving throw equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you have combat advantage against the target, it grants combat advantage and cannot take opportunity actions until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Fury of Gibbeth
power.fluff: You revive the memory of ancient Gibbeth the Endless, slain before the primordials' forge fires burned, and though the recollection is imperfect and formless, it strikes out with all-too-real limbs of hate before you hastily forget it

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d8 + Charisma modifier force damage, and the target is suffering from Gibbeth's fury (save ends).
While it is suffering from the fury, at the start of each of its turn, the target must succeed on an Acrobatics check (same DC as the effect) or fall prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target must succeed on an Acrobatics check (DC 10 + one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier) or fall prone.

power.title: Hellsworn Blessing
power.fluff: The words you whisper in an ally's ear transform your companion into a more useful servant

section.name: Target:
section.text: One willing ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target assumes the form of a hellsworn until the end of the encounter. You can also dismiss the effect as a minor action.
While in this form, the target gains the following benefits:
► Darkvision
► +1 power bonus to attack rolls. This increases to +2 against targets under your curse.
► Deal 2d6 extra fire damage with melee attacks.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Resist fire equal to 5 + one-half your level. If the target already has a greater resist fire, increase that by +5 instead.

power.title: Hunger of Hadar
power.fluff: You create a zone of complete, impermeable darkness filled with flying, fluttering, fanged shadows that rend the very life force of creatures caught within

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The blast or burst creates a zone of darkness until the end of your next.

The zone blocks line of sight, and creatures that enter the zone or start their turn in the zone take necrotic damage equal to 4 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can only take this damage once per turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn, and you make the Rending Shadows attack.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature within the zone

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

power.title: Lure of Gibbeth
power.fluff: A fleeting thought of Gibbeth the Endless, an unknowable entity slain at the birth of the world yet poised to return at its end, seizes your enemy's mind and draws it to you like a moth to flame

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target 4 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you pull the target 2 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you can use the following action once per round:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: You pull the target 2 squares.

power.title: Nightshade Dream
power.fluff: Your hand turns black as you reach forward to deliver a dose of nightshade poison to your foe

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target is inflicted with nightshade (save ends).
While inflicted, the target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 poison damage.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target suffers from traces of nightshade (save ends).
While suffering, the target grants combat advantage and takes ongoing 5 poison damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target suffers from traces of nightshade (save ends).

power.title: Roaring Storm of Cania
power.fluff: A gale of frigid wind rips through your foes, hurling them to the ground and pelting them with razor-sharp blades of ice

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target falls prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Shard of Darkness
power.fluff: A frozen blade of raw shadowstuff appears in your hand, then cripples a fow with cold when it strikes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is immobilized (save ends) instead.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.
You gain a cumulative +2 bonus to attack rolls for each miss if you have not made any other attacks when you use this power again. This bonus is lost at the end of the encounter.

power.title: Tentacles of Cryonax
power.fluff: The temperature plummets as two ghastly, white tentacles emerge from out of nowhere to grab your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure two icy tentacles, each in an unoccupied square in the burst. The tentacles occupy their square and persist until the end of your next turn.

Each creature other than you that starts its turn adjacent to a tentacle takes cold damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus and is slowed until the start of its next turn.
While at least one tentacle remains, you can use the Frozen Tentacle attack at-will, using one of the tentacles as the point of origin.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: Roll a d6. On a 1, remove one tentacle. On a 6, add one tentacle to an unoccupied square within 10 squares of you.
If no tentacles remain, the power ends. If you have one or more tentacles remaining, the power persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, the tentacle pulls the target 1 square, and the target is grabbed (escape ends).
The target makes escape attempts against your Will.

section.name: Each failed escape attempt:
section.text: The target takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Twilight of the Soul
power.fluff: A gray aura withers your foe, quelling not only light but the will to live

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is withered (save ends).

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against this effect.
While withered, the target takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage, and has a penalty to Will equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target takes half the penalty to Will (save ends).

power.title: Tyrannical Threat
power.fluff: You speak, and each syllable is a deadly insinuation, each utterance a dangerous threat, and each sentence a dire curse

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: Close burst 4

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: If the target is not currsed by you, you place your curse on it.
2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: If the target is not cursed by you, you place your curse on it after it has taken the damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever a creature cursed by you makes an attack against you, it takes psychic damage after the attack has been resolved. The damage equals your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Venomous Webs
power.fluff: Sticky webs slick with acid burn your foes, poisoning their flesh with each step

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast or burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and the target grants combat advantage (save ends).

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target willingly moves before the end of its next turn, it takes ongoing poison (save ends). The damage equals your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: Each time the target willingly moves, it takes a cumulative -2 penalty to its next saving throw against this ongoing poison damage.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: This power gains the Illusion keyword.
The target's vision blurs when it moves. While it suffers from the ongoing poison damage, it grants combat advantage during any movement.

power.title: Vestige of Baatar
power.fluff: You call upon Baatar the Tiderider, a powerful water archon, to drown your foe in elemental water

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is drowning (save ends).
While drowning, the target takes ongoing 5 damage and is dazed.

section.name: First Failed Saving Throw:
section.text: The target is unconscious instead of dazed.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is coughing up water (save ends).
While coughing, the target is slowed and grants combat advantage.

section.name: Pact Boon:
section.text: Choose one creature under your curse. Until the end of your next turn, that creature cannot charge, run or shift, and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls with Fire powers.
Eyes of the Vestige Augment: Until the end of your next turn, when ally hits the target, you can slide it 1 square as a free reaction, or 2 squares if the ally's attack was a critical hit.
